The U: S. Army Command and General Staff College confirmed on Twitter that the U.S. Army was not contacting anyone regarding the draft.
The draft has not been in effect since 1: and the military has been an all-volunteer force since that time. Registering for the Selective Service does not enlist a person into the military.
The Selective Service: the agency responsible for conducting a new draft, stated on Twitter that no military draft would occur unless authorized by Congress and the U.S. president passing legislation.
